column3: â€œOk, I started smoking Super Jack about a year ago, religiously and on a regular basis.  Over that time you get to know the personality of a strain really well.  Here's my moment of clarity about Super Jack:  it is the ultimate chore" weed.  It makes you want to do productive things.  In fact
column4: it makes you want to do things that you normally wouldn't even want to do
column5: that maybe you've been putting off.  Menial tasks ...â€"

column3: â€œgiven the fact that all I really smoke is mainly indica strains or sometimes an indica dominant hybrid. for example during the day I'll smoke an indica like LA confidential that doesn't put me to sleep and keeps me functional while also keeping me calm as I'm manic a lot due to my bi polar which is why I stick to indicas, I've always strayed from sativas cuz I worried about anxiety/paranoia,, but I gave this super ja...â€

â€œThis review is for an absolutely stunning and, by all rights, flawless grown and cured version of this strain fresh from one of the most expensive, highest-rated dispensaries in LA.

Exceptionally vibrant, clear vision but with narrow, specific focus. Emotional state is on point for Jacks; light, uplifting, and euphoric. However, and also true for Jacks, is its emotional instability. Feelings are a bit edgy and fragi...â€

â€œStupidly clear headed! Vision is bright and wide eyed - almost fish lensed. Ok mental high building like snow accumulating very fast. Super cottony and numb. Head and shoulders miles above rest of body. Has an extremely unique headspace - real distant, yet precise.  Itâ€™s a pleasant contrast. Not incapacitating. Super easy to form thoughts. A real peaceful, confident, pretty potent, and sustained high. Impressive. Mak...â€
â€œTopshelf definitely.. Don't pass this up if you come across it. Must  have sativaâ€

â€œBest daytime high ever. I suffer from fatigue and this kept me going all day. Great for my neck pain as well. This has a smooth flavor, initial scent is earthy but leaves a sweet taste in your mouth. This stuff quiets the noise in your head and allows you to focus hard on the task at hand. Not the best for being creative in my case as my thoughts sort of stalled out but definitely good when you need to get menial, mi...â€

â€œI tried this strain once, I loved the uplifted feel of this strain, just thought the energetic effect would last longer. I wanted this to be a daytime strain but after a few hours I got pretty sleepy... this is only something I can use in the afternoon.â€
â€œMakes me happy and hornyâ€

â€œSmoked Half a Bowl of this Flower out of a small glass pipe, the smell was fruity, floral, with a slight nectar smell - similar to honeysuckle flowers.   The taste was part Piney and Part Earthy with a slight Earthy aftertaste on the Palate.  The high comes on steady with the first 30 minutes being sharp, clear, focused and happy over then the high becomes more intense and psychedelic, however the psychedelic effects...â€

â€œWaking up hazy in the morning? Dreading the day ahead of you?
Time to get some SUPER JACK!!!!!

Ok cheesy intro aside, this stuff is legit believe me! Last couple of weeks I've been dragging, long hours at work left me feeling beat down, so all I wanted to do was go home and relax with some indica. Unfortunately too much indica leaves me feeling groggy in the morning, to the point where I was snoozing my alarm twice....â€

â€œI love this strain! I'm a sativa smoker mostly so I like to keep a clean high. i always smoke this when I have errands to run. when i wake & bake this is my replacement for coffee because i will be productive through out my whole high w out that crash either. the only thing I would recommend is like coffee this will keep you up even for a more experienced Sativa smoker. With that said you wont get all paranoid or  an...â€
â€œthis strain is really good. I mean I'm not that much of a sativa smoker but this sativa has a real good taste to it, it didn't get me lazy. it had me thinking in a very positive wayâ€

â€œHave yet to find a better sativa than super jack. Great weed for a wake and bake day because it gives you a clean and crisp buzz but relaxed mind and body. Like a warm cup of coffee on a cold winter morning, super jack feels like peace. Like all reviews, written after a few tokes.â€
â€œSuper Jack OG!! Grew like a beast producing almost big bud style nugs ranging from 2g~23gğŸ”¥ daytime smoke, roll it up.â€

â€œI've come to appreciate and expect energy when I try a JACK blend; and, Super Jack is no exception. Take some Jack Herer add some Super Silver Haze, which is another excellent strain for pick-me-up, and you get ğŸ”¥. I've found that the uplifting energy" effects last a bit longer than either of the predecessors of this strain. Another quality that really stands out regarding Super Jack is the look and aroma of its flo...â€"

â€œWell, damn. I just smoked super jack thinking it was purple urkle diesel. I'm at the end of a long day and have been looking forward to lighting up my bedtime bud for a while...but no. Super jack has me up doing dishes, cleaning the kitchen, folding laundry, and damnit I've eaten 6 flour tortillas! And now I'm writing a review on leafly! 

Love this strain, just not right before bed. It's the get shit you don't want ...â€

â€œThis Sativa was by Saucey Farms & had 22% THC. Happy, uplifted, upbeat, & mellow were the effects. Scents & flavors were like Jack Herer, skunky, piney, pungent, & earthy. Firm olive drab buds with lots of light brown pistils & fine fuzzy golden hairs with trichomes. Ideal wake & bake strain. Happiest Of Sedation's!â€

â€œReading all the reviews reminds me of how subjective 
these strains can be and how each individual responds to them.
Who grew it, what medium did they grow with, did the grower
harvest too early, was the plant flushed properly, was the harvest
cured properly..
These can make a strain your best friend or a nasty high you wish 
you'd never smoked and want it to be over with.
With that being said; mine came from Billows...â€

â€œThis is that get stuff done strain, distinctive smell and look associated with the Jack. Just the right recipe for all day blazing.

A truly great Sativa in my opinion.â€

â€œGreat day time high! Get it done with this super jack! Good head high and keeps you focused for the day. A little too bouncy for an evening strain for me personally, unless I'm going to be up for a while!â€

â€œExtremely intense burst of cerebral stimulus, resulting in a lasting effect of energy and focus.
The Ritalin of Weed.â€

â€œThe smell didn't really come out representing both strains - the citrusy spicy aroma of SSHaze doesn't really come through, and I get a completely stanky, danky, skunk smell.  If it were a blind smell-test I'd say it was J-1; Jack & Skunk#1.  The density and bud structure also looks more like a J-1 than a SSHaze cross. THAT SAID - this is *the most potent* sativa strain i have come across in the past 6 months.  Who k...â€
â€œFirst time Sativa - will def but again. Felt light on feet, extra calm and happy.  Wasnâ€™t a couch lock kinda of buzzâ€
â€œGreat gaming one, huge smile on my faceâ€
â€œGreat gaming one, huge smile on my faceâ€
â€œThis is the one that turned me from indica to sativa. Just a total mood lifter. I can even work out with this. My happy strain.â€

â€œThis one here is a great mood lifter and energy producer. Great for simulating conversation and helping boost energy.  Also gave me a euphoric giggly high. Great saliva for the person constantly on the move.â€

â€œ10/10. Amazing strain. Whoever is growing this junk in San Diego is doing a damn good job. If I get this strain again and it's this fantastic, it will bump out Maui Waui for #1 Sativa.

Perfect for a low paranoia, low stupor strain to help with PTSD/Anxiety symptoms. I suspect it works well for pain/headaches too.

I can function with ease on this. True Sativa. Very uplifting, happy energetic high. Potent, but not ov...â€
â€œA very frosty and pungent strain. Every time I find this bud it comes with a powerful aroma that cant be beat. This is my favorite sativa right now and I highly recommend it.â€

â€œTo me, Super Jack is one of the best sativaâ€™s Iâ€™ve had. Very energetic, cerebral, true to its lineage and name. I remember my first impression of this strain was extremely positive because I had gotten it for a particular kind of effect I wanted for a trip I was taking. I tried the Super Jack for my sativa choice, a strain that would hopefully get me going and focused. I love when a strain does pretty much what you w...â€
â€œThis is a great get some stuff done' strain. It's almost impossible to just sit still and do nothing and that is exactly why I like this most.â€"

â€œGot this stuff from Bloom in Phoenix at the suggestion of Jeff, one of the budtenders there. I'm quite impressed with the recommendation. I really love the taste. When I set it to 390 I get hints of tea and the citrus. Heck, the flower smelled ...â€

  Just a yummy, not too pungent.. tend to talk a bit after I vape a bit.. could you have guessed that I've had some now? :)â€

â€œThis is my favorite! Currently typing this review baked and people hear me out: I just went out with friends and I had no care in the whole world! If you are looking to be chill at a little kids birthday party, look no further! The sensation will quickly kick in and your cares will be gone!â€

â€œPopNatural oil, vaped...great sativa with super focused mental, though after awhile feeling subdued and disinterested in work....in YouTube troll mode kinda...1.5 hours later....not sure how long I've been here but, just realized the heavy high subdued-ness is gone and feeling nice, cool and high but good :)â€
â€œFun, good spirited, productive/creative high. No anxiety or paranoia. Makes me want to do stuff. A new favorite.â€
â€œI did get a bit anxious when I was on this, but over all it's a solid creative strain. I felt pretty energetic, but was watching a movie and still felt relaxed.â€
â€œgreat!â€
â€œThe very best smelling and looking Sativa I have run across, and I got it at ggac.â€
â€œI picked up a $22 outdoor eighth of this strain, and was not disappointed. It almost looked like shake, but this strain is no joke. Very lethargic, relaxing, and good for stress.â€
â€œTasteâ€

â€œThis is definitely a strain that can be smoked in the day time. It definitely keeps you up and alert. Its a good No dry mouth , nice smooth high. Enjoying itâ€
â€œLet's just say my stash is going quickly! I love the way it makes me feel. Very uplifting. Everything feels good! And it smells so fine.â€

â€œI haven't written a review but this Super Jack hits that perfect heady sativa high while still being fun without the edge of paranoia which some sativas display. The smell is disinfectant but the taste is cherry smooth. I feel energetic and mellow while focused. The description here on Leafly is perfect.â€

â€œThis was a fun sativa. It was a very high quality, so the taste was there, the smell was great, and the short term and long lasting high was nice. Super jack is uplifting, creative, yet not really focused, just a real high.â€

â€œHands down, one of my favorite strains. My girlfriend and I usually try to think of a task to complete right after we smoke Super Jack and end up getting into 2 hour discussions about the world, philosophy, and why people settle for unhappiness. It makes you feel like you can change the world. 

We feel crazy cuddly, thoughtful, energetic, and excitable. Definitely not a sleepy weed.â€
â€œIt was great the first time, but now when I smoke it I cant stand up or do anything or Iâ€™ll faint. This is the only strain that has ever made me faint.â€

â€œUsually have a pretty high tolerance but surprisingly this strain had some opposite effects, especially for a sativa, than I expected. Has a really great initial euphoric body high but ended up making me really drowsy, couch locked, and eventually passed out...Also gives me red eye. Overall was a nice smooth smoke but if you plan to use this throughout the day, less is more.â€
â€œTook a very small dose from my Arizer with whip. Feeling uplifted and energized and motivated. Might have spontaneously started singing a couple tunes. ğŸ™‚â€

â€œsweet and smooth strain, really tasty definitely helps w the creativity, pain, stress etc. although I definitely donâ€™t feel the energy boost, I just donâ€™t feel lazy but once it wears off Iâ€™m hella sleepy :/ maybe itâ€™s just me but I am legitimately ready for a nap. I would still definitely recommend this strain because everyone is different. Super duper smooth hits very nice.â€

â€œSuper Silver Haze makes some great crosses and this is yet another one. This one's like Jack Herer dipped in butter with extra trichomes. Feels almost entirely sativa IMO. Very energizing with no crash like I get with some sativas, fades into general upbeat feeling after a long lasting buzz.â€
